main event: A UFO sighting occurred on May 19, 1960 in Tallassee, Alabama, described as a small round object that appeared extremely high and white-clear before fading away in fog.
interesting points: The observer noticed the object while cutting grass,The observation lasted for about 2 minutes,The object appeared bright and shiny at times,No aircraft were reported in the area at the time of the sighting,Weather conditions were clear with no visible clouds.
witness description: The observer noticed the object while cutting grass.
